amendment.description: To modify the authorization of appropriations.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4174 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4174 proposed by Senator Boozman for Senator Portman. (consideration: CR S7870-7871; text: CR S7871-7878) To modify the authorization of appropriations.

Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4174 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
